block.title: SignalFx Forwarder
block.text: Configure this app to send to your SignalFx organization

Set your SignalFx Realm below. To determine what realm you are in, and which Ingest URL to use, check your profile page in the SignalFx web application (click the avatar in the upper right and click My Profile).
If you want to provide the ingest URL directly, you can do so, but leave the Realm option blank.
